product_name: Amphipod Full-Tilt AirStretch Velocity Hydration Waistpack - 20 fl. oz.
long_description: The Amphipod Full-Tilt AirStretch(TM) Velocity hydration waistpack offers a lightweight design and a low profile that help eliminate the discomfort of traditional bottle packs. Adjustable AirStretch belt features ample stretch and chafe-free edging for comfort while maintaining bounce-free performance. Back-friendly symmetrical design eliminates uneven weighting, chafing and uncomfortable pressure points. AirFlow Mesh(TM) hybrid mesh technology wicks away moisture and circulates air between your back and the pack. 40 cu. in. compartment holds key, ID and cash. BPA-free 20 fl. oz. Hydraform(TM) water bottle nests laterally for a naturally comfortable fit. Low-profile bottle flattens center of gravity, reducing slosh and bounce. The Amphipod Full-Tilt AirStretch Velocity hydration waistpack securely holds its bottle in place and accommodates easy bottle access.
short_description: The Amphipod Full-Tilt AirStretch(TM) Velocity hydration waistpack offers a lightweight design and a low profile that help eliminate the discomfort of traditional bottle packs.
